derivation: a primitive root, apparently meaning to mediate in religious services; but used only as denominative from H3548 (כֹּהֵן);
outline:
1. to act as a priest, minister in a priest's office
    1. (Piel)
      1. to minister as a priest, serve as a priest
      2. to be or become a priest
      3. to play the priest
kjv_def: deck, be (do the office of a, execute the, minister in the) priest('s office).
strongs_def: to officiate as a priest; figuratively, to put on regalia
